# vDSP_zcoherD

**Function**

Computes the coherence function of two double-precision vectors.

## Declaration

```swift
extern void vDSP_zcoherD(const double * __A, const double * __B, const DSPDoubleSplitComplex * __C, double * __D, vDSP_Length __N);
```

## Discussion

This function is the same as [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vDSP_zcoher], except for the types of vectors `A`, `B`, `C`, and `D`.

## Vector-to-Vector Coherence Function Computation

- **vDSP_zcoher**: Computes the coherence function of two single-precision vectors.
